meanings.definition: A woman who assigns tasks and ensures they are completed.
meanings.sent1: The taskmistress at the office always makes sure everyone finishes their work on time.
meanings.sent2: The taskmistress in the group project divided the tasks evenly among the team members.
meanings.sent3: The taskmistress playfully challenged her friends to complete a scavenger hunt in record time.
meanings.sent4: The taskmistress of the household ruled over chores with an iron fist.
meanings.sent5: The taskmistress's presence loomed large, motivating everyone to stay on track.

meanings.definition: A strict or demanding person who oversees work assignments.
meanings.sent1: The team leader was known as the taskmistress for her high expectations and attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: The taskmistress scrutinized every detail of the project to ensure perfection.
meanings.sent3: Despite her tough exterior, the taskmistress had a kind heart and always supported her team.
meanings.sent4: The taskmistress's gaze was like a laser beam, catching any mistakes instantly.
meanings.sent5: Under the taskmistress's watchful eye, the team's productivity soared.
